entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
